definitions.title: n.pr.mont.
definitions.body: Horeb (waste, desert)—LXX Cwrhb (v. Lag:BN 85); [[אֶל־הַר הָאֱלֽהִים]] [[חׂרֵָבָה]] Ex 3:1 (E), cf. [[עַד הַר הָאֱלֽהִים חׂרֵב]] 1Ki 19:8; [[הַצּוּר בְּחׂרֵב]] Ex 17:6, [[הַר חוֹרֵב]] Ex 33:6 (both E); [[מֵחׂרֵב]], [[בְּחׂרֵב]] De 1:2, De 1:6, De 1:19, De 4:10, De 4:15, De 5:2, De 9:8, De 18:16, De 28:69; 1Ki 8:9, 2Ch 5:10, Ps 106:19, Mal 3:22; the sacred mountain of the wilderness, no geograph. diff. from [[סִינַי]] discoverable, but synonym of it in E and (esp.) D (except poem De 33:2; vid. [[סִינַי]] P).
